arvig 17.12.0
  • Overview
  • Replication

ARVIG dataset.

arvig.Rd

A dataset containing 6918 georeferenced events of anti-refugee violence and social unrest in Germany during the years 2014 to 2017.

arvig

Format

A data frame with 6918 rows and 10 variables:

date

date of event

location

city or town of event as reported

state

federal state of event

community_id

12-digit community identification number of reported city/town as used by statistical offices

longitude

longitude of event

latitude

latitude of event

category_de

type of event (German)

category_en

type of event (English)

description

short summary of event

source

primary source

Source

https://www.mut-gegen-rechte-gewalt.de
